summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6042 for the improvement of Thorndyke Place West from 24th Avenue West to Thorndyke Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82133 as amended by Ordinance No. 82212, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
